mdRecord.dcterms:description: These pictures are portraits of James Adair, III as a young child. He is called Jim on the photograph. Both poses show him standing. In Pose 1 he seems to be wearing a sailor suit and in Pose 2 he is wearing a swimming outfit. These prints were made from the original glass plate negatives, which are housed at Virginia Historical Society.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Portraits of James Adair, III as a child (photographs)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Portrait photography
Virginia -- Rockbridge County
Twentieth century
